page.title: 20A typical family day (ctd)
page.content: Jake said :"Can I have my dinner now," because it was twelve o'clock.My Dad was eating his at work.Now it was two o'clock and I was busy at school.We were laughing about Alison's story chapter 1 which was called "Building the time machine".Then I heard the bell go so I put up my chair and went home.When I got home I had my tea. After my tea I went out to play with my friend Heather.At 7:30 I had to go in to have my crisps and a drink. Afterwards I went to bed and Jake went to bed too. ********* All the information about this block was contributed by children from St.Martin's Junior School, Worle. *********
